channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Translate Multilingual sites – TranslatePress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Translate Multilingual sites – TranslatePress

item.title: CVE-2022-3141|2024-08-03T01:00:10.566Z -- unknown -- translate%20multilingual%20sites%20%E2%80%93%20translatepress
item.description: The Translate Multilingual sites WordPress plugin before 2.3.3 is vulnerable to an authenticated SQL injection. By adding a new language (via the settings page) containing specific special characters, the backticks in the SQL query can be surpassed and a time-based blind payload can be injected.
